name: Ch20ABaseConvo5
_source: speak;Joshua;The war is almost over.|Tomorrow we march into the heart of darkness itself.
speak;Gerik;Aye.|By this time tomorrow, we'll either be celebrating victory...|or we'll be dead.
speak;Joshua;I've been thinking.|The three best swordsmen in this army...|and we've never settled who's actually the best.
speak;Gerik;You choose now to worry about that?
speak;Joshua;What better time?|Tomorrow we face our destiny.|Tonight might be our last chance.
speak;Gerik;I suppose there's wisdom in it.|One last duel to remember each other by.
speak;Joshua;Exactly.|A memory to carry with us, whatever tomorrow brings.
speak;Marisa;...A fitting farewell.|Should fate separate us.
speak;Joshua;When this war began, I was just a wandering gambler.|Now I'm fighting alongside legends.
speak;Gerik;The <red>Desert Tiger</> and the <red>Crimson Flash</>...|and the Prince of Jehanna.|Who would have thought?
speak;Marisa;Our paths...converged for a reason.|This duel honors that.
speak;Gerik;In all my years as a mercenary...|you two are among the finest I've fought beside.
speak;Joshua;Which is why I need to know.|Before we face the Prince of Grado.|Which of us is truly the best?
speak;Marisa;The answer has always been clear.|It's me.
speak;Gerik;Ha!|Bold words from you, Marisa.|But experience trumps youth.
speak;Joshua;You're both forgetting...|fortune favors me.|And my blade is just as sharp as my luck.
speak;Gerik;Blunted weapons.|First to three solid hits wins.|And regardless of the outcome...
speak;Joshua;One last wager, then.|Winner gets first choice of weapons from the royal armory of Jehanna.|When I reclaim my throne.
speak;Gerik;Assuming we survive tomorrow.|I'll hold you to that, Prince.
speak;Marisa;Agreed.|But neither of you will survive our duel.
speak;Joshua;Tonight we test our steel against each other.|Tomorrow, against destiny itself.
speak;Gerik;Whatever happens tomorrow...|It's been an honor fighting alongside you both.
speak;Joshua;Now let's see which of us deserves to lead the charge against the Demon King!|Ready your blades!
